value.name: Remembering George Floyd: Atlanta pays tribute to him, others, a year later
value.description: Hannah Williams said her family was lucky to have seen police body camera footage of the death of her brother, Matthew Zadok Williams. On April 12, Matthew Zadok Williams was shot by DeKalb County Police and died inside his home.

value.name: Crowd rallies downtown to remember George Floyd and highlight local cases involving police
value.description: A crowd of about 100 people rallied downtown Tuesday to remember George Floyd, killed a year ago by a since fired and convicted former Minneapolis police officer. The gathering also focused attention on people who have died following police shootings in metro Atlanta.

value.name: Activist on Chauvin trial guilty verdict: 'There's a George Floyd in every town'
value.description: Dozens of activists came to a mural located in downtown Atlanta not knowing the outcome of the verdict, but the plan was to march in solidarity no matter what.

video.name: Activist on Chauvin trial guilty verdict: 'There's a George Floyd in every town'

value.name: Demonstrators rally in downtown Atlanta to honor George Floyd one year after murder
value.description: May 25 marks one-year since a Minneapolis Police Officer killed Floyd. Demonstrators gathered in downtown Atlanta to honor Floyd's life and continue to call for social justice and police reform.

video.name: Demonstrators rally in downtown Atlanta to honor George Floyd one year after murder
